text:
@PressSec Is your heart breaking for the 130,000+ Americans who died because the Republican Trump Administration refused to create and implement a plan to protect the country?

#TrumpVirus #RacistInChief #COVIDー19 #coronavirus https://t.co/QrUAebyu6s
